scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run push && gcloud builds submit --tag us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/what-i-miss-441605/tldr-pr--repo/tldr-pr && gcloud builds submit --tag us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/what-i-miss-441605/tldr-pr--repo/tldr-pr && gcloud run deploy tldr-pr-cloud-run-app --image us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/what-i-miss-441605/tldr-pr--repo/tldr-pr --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated
